summary: Post-teen virgin moves to New York City, falls for a cold-hearted beauty, then finds true love with a loyal lass.
cast: Elizabeth Hartman|Geraldine Page|Peter Kastner|Rip Torn|Michael Dunn|Tony Bill|Julie Harris|Karen Black|Dolph Sweet|Michael O'Sullivan|Ronald Colby|Rufus Harley|Frank Simpson|Nina Varela|Len De Carl|Emily|Roman Coppola|Bill Walters
title: Ya eres un gran chico
